lead_paragraph: Kyrie Irving scored 29 points, LeBron James added 27 and the Cleveland Cavaliers bounced back from two straight losses with a 99-84 win over the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Irving, James Lead Cavaliers Past Pelicans 99-84
headline.main: Irving, James Lead Cavaliers Past Pelicans 99-84

snippet: Kyrie Irving scored 29 points, LeBron James added 27 and the Cleveland Cavaliers bounced back from two straight losses with a 99-84 win over the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday night....
